entry.summary: ...Snow showers around this morning... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...Snow showers. Accumulations generally an inch or less but locally up to 2 to 3 inches where snow banding sets up. * WHERE...Fremont, Natrona and Sublette Counties.

entry.title: Flood Advisory issued March 04 at 8:18AM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR AN ICE JAM REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Hydrologic flooding caused by an ice jam continues. * WHERE...Park County about 12 miles southwest of Cody. The minor flooding caused by an ice jam is impacting areas from the 6Qs road Bridge near StageTrail road, south to just north of the junction
